name: Police Car Action Driver 3D - Asphalt Burning Street Driving with Nitro
name_original: Police Car Action Driver 3D - Asphalt Burning Street Driving with Nitro
description:
Enjoy the free use of speed, the freedom of all cars letting you go in this special driving game. Racing against the time and criminals is essential in the world of Police Car Action Driver, where good reflexes and skills are needed if you want to participate in the chase.
This is no joke, no slow and lazy special vehicles are racing, here the quickest cars are driving chasing each other.
You are the police, you must catch them all. No mercy for the criminals!

For more information please visit our website: www.pocketscientists.com
